howTo.title: How to create a parlay?
howTo.step1: Go to markets page, select at least 2 matches
howTo.step2: Choose your prediction for each match
howTo.step3: Return to parlay page, check combined odds
howTo.step4: Enter bet amount and create parlay

rules.title: Parlay Rules
rules.rule2: Combined odds = each match odds multiplied
rules.rule3: All correct to win, any wrong loses all
rules.rule4: Correlation penalty: same or related matches may reduce odds
